title: House Republicans Fail to Learn From the Political Mistakes of the Confederacy
text: Whether it's the ousting of the House Speaker and his heir apparent, or witnessing Paul Ryan have to beg the Freedom Caucus to let him have the job, even Republicans agree that the process is almost hopeless broken. It's not too different
